title: Bloomberg's Micklethwait on Potential Upheaval of Brexit(Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Micklethwait on Potential Upheaval of Brexit(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: John Micklethwait, Editor-In-Chief for Bloomberg Editorial, on Brexit and his recent interview with former UK prime minister. Tony Blair.
